## IntersectionTypeSchema interface

TypeScript intersection type, like `A & B`

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface IntersectionTypeSchema 
```

## Remarks

See: [https://www.typescriptlang.org/docs/handbook/2/objects.html\#intersection-types](https://www.typescriptlang.org/docs/handbook/2/objects.html#intersection-types)

## Example


```ts
type X1 = A & B;
type X2 = A & (B | C);

```
